title: We prosper together, we prosper on purpose!

items.name: Our Vision
items.description: We envision an eminent conglomerate which will be able toaccelerate Ethiopia's journey of becoming self-sufficient as well as supplier of the world’.

items.name: Our Mission
items.description: Execute viable investment projects and apply state of the art technologies and management in order to unshackle economic setbacks, the prevailing market demand and make significant contribution to Ethiopia’s journey of ‘becoming self-sufficient as well as supplier of the world’.

items.name: Aspiration and commitment
items.description: We aspire to see Africa in general and Ethiopia in particular to maximize and unleash the giant potential and be self-sufficient and be distinguished supplier of the world. We are committed to be leading agro processing producer, bold player in the manufacturing sector and we want to maximize out of the naturally endowed resources and be quality ambassador. We ultimately want to see generation relieved from economic setbacks and unhindered innovations in our community.
